abiDocs.name: claimHeirOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows heir to transfer ownership only if heartbeat has timed out.

abiDocs.name: proclaimDeath
abiDocs.details: Heir can pronounce the owners death. To claim the ownership, they will have to wait for `heartbeatTimeout` seconds.

abiDocs.name: heartbeat
abiDocs.details: Owner can send a heartbeat if they were mistakenly pronounced dead.

abiDocs.name: renounceOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
abiDocs.notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

abiDocs.name: heir
abiDocs.details: Use these getter functions to access the internal variables in an inherited contract.

inputs.name: _newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
